name: narrow (Harry)
description:
Latest: blockout with ~10km of navigable waterway and topography. Collision disabled, boat does not lock to changing elevation.

the narrow boating game you've been waiting for

hold left ctrl and use mouse up/down to control the throttle

hold left shift and use mouse left/right to turn the tiller

double tap ctrl to zero the throttle

double tap shift to centre the tiller

space to activate a lock (NOTE: locks are not working while their functionality is rewritten)

C to change camera angle
